reviews.review_msg: Nothing personal.. Good guy but his teaching style of writing on OH with no lecture slides for the entire course did not work for me at all as there was nothing to preview before class. Besides his notes, there was no fall-back as the tutorial questions were not from the book. Dunno what to say.. mixed feelings.. this course pulled down my GPA

He made me fall in love in ECON!He is a GREAT prof I have ever seen.Exams are easy and straight foraward.Average is DAMN HIGH(abt 80%),so if you wanna get A you'd better make sure all your answers correct,not an easy job actually.But still recommand to take 105 with this funny guy.Never let you sleep in the class.
